item.title: Unreal - Python
item.description: Setup Python Enable the plugins you wish to use. There might be more scripting modules under the scripting tab depending on what you have installed and what you wish to be able to modify with python. Edit > Plugins > Scripting > Python Editor Script Plugin : Enable We need to enable developer mode on a per project basis Edit > Project Settings > Plugins > Python Developer Mode : Enable We can find the output log here:
